document.full_text: the red-hot los angeles lakers extended their winning streak to seven games with a 112-104 victory over the los angeles clippers at the staples center on friday.
document.title: la lakers in seventh heaven with win over la clippers
lines_and_colors: the red-hot los angeles lakers extended their winning streak to seven games with a 112-104 victory over the los angeles clippers at the staples center on friday.
